frames.caption: Two women are posing together, smiling warmly at the camera. One is wearing a white cardigan over a red top, while the other is dressed in a black dress with red tights.
frames.description: The scene captures a joyful moment between two friends or family members, set against a simple, neutral background. Their expressions convey happiness and camaraderie.

frames.caption: Two people are embracing warmly against a plain backdrop. They are smiling, conveying a sense of closeness and affection.
frames.description: The scene captures a moment of affection between two individuals in a simple setting, highlighting their connection.

summary: People: women, two people. Objects: cardigan, dress, tights, clothing. Actions: smiling, posing, hugging. Emotions: happiness, friendship, affection. Scenes: portrait. Concepts: togetherness, fashion, friendship
